channel.title: A few more questions
channel.description:
1. Were is a site that tells like ids, the one i used to use is gone.
2. How do i let people edit their looks? doing it in the edit charecter frame alone doenst work.
3. Sorry if any of this has been asked already, but im laggin bad right now so i dont wanna go searching, what is a good code to ban people? i tried testscapes and cheezscapes and neather one seems to work.
4. is there a way to make a save command? so people dont have to keep logging out to save, or an autosave thing liek real rs, i have tried tons of different ways and none seem to work.
